text: 12.58: Snd 25.8; Mt 5.25Ndu maaŋ muuŋgip ndun pana guma, ana ndu ndigip, ndu suaŋ bigi ndi thɨgɨra mbai guman han ŋgɨp ndu suaŋv suan saŋv ŋgɨri. Ndu mba tugen ŋko wani tɨgɨp, ana han ŋgɨp, ndu tuav sɨgen ŋko wani phorgɨ suaŋv mba bigeŋ ndi thɨgɨr mbarari. Ndu maaŋ muuŋgirga fhu, ana ndu ndim, mba bigi ndi thɨgɨra mbai guman farve khɨngirga, ana ndu ndim gɨɨtɨvi farve khɨngirim, mbe ndu ndim bɨna khɨngirga.
